mapper.insert: insert into diagnostic_tests (member_id, patient_id, inspection_status, created_date, diag_id) values (#{memberId}, #{patientId}, #{inspectionStatus}, #{createdDate}, #{diagId})
mapper.select: select diag_test_id, member_id, patient_id, inspection_status, created_date, diag_id from diagnostic_tests where diag_id=#{diagId}
select diag_test_id, member_id, patient_id, inspection_status, created_date, diag_id from diagnostic_tests where member_id=#{memberId} and DATE(created_date) between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
